Body:
I have a Raspberry Pi 2 with Windows 10 ioT. How do I set the time of the device using C# ? Thanks

P.S. If not possible, how do I set the timezone ?

You can do this by connecting remotely to your device via Powershell and running "tzutil".

Current time zone

TZUTIL /g

Current time

date

To get a list of all available time zones

tzutil /l

Set time zone

TZUTIL /s "Pakistan Standard Time"

"
